attributes.action: Honour the Chief Medical Officer Chris Whitty with a knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: I think the government need a gentle push to reward the treasure that is clearly right under their nose!
attributes.background: Chris Whitty has been an absolute rock providing essential advice, he has recently been called upon to address the nation on his own to plead with people to stay at home from a non political perspective.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
